name: companies
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeding_data.
Tool description: Completely APIs that helps web developers and web designers generate fake data in a fast and easy way.
API description: Fetch a specified quantity of companies for a given locale from the RapidAPI endpoint.

quantity.description: The number of companies to retrieve.

locale.description: The locale code for the data, e.g., 'en_US'.
